name: Baragwin
Lore: 'Hunchbacked scavengers. Found in separate groups throughout the galaxy. Good at finding missing items. Make excellent gun runners. Some work with the rebellion.',
Text: 'Once per turn, if the top card of your Lost Pile is a weapon, device or transport vehicle, may use 1 Force to retrieve it. During your control phase, may exchange one card in hand for one weapon or device in your Lost Pile.',
